item.title: What's wrong with my command?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

every time I put this command in to client.java I get 100 errors
here’s my command

if (command.startsWith("commands") && playerRights >= 0) { sendMessage("This is a list of commands!"); sendMessage("~ Regular Players: ::starter, ::runes, ::brunes"); sendMessage("::suggest, ::funjail, ::yell, use the tele tabs to tele 2 places"); sendMessage("~ Mod Commands: ::pure, ::modgear, ::jail, ::unjail, ::staff"); sendMessage("~ Admin Commands: ::admingear, ::tele, ::xteleto, ::xteletome, ::pickup, ::notedbarrows"); sendMessage("~ Owner Commands: ::master, ::bowtomaster, ::ipban, ::ban, ::unban, ::getpass"); sendMessage("::99hp, ::eat");
